text: War Brokers is a free to play, browser based multiplayer game released as an open beta for browser by Trebuchet Entertainment LLC on November 13, 2017 and on Steam on April 18, 2018. The game uses the Unity engine. Closed testing for an Android release started in May 2020. == Gameplay == War Brokers is first person shooter video game with three modes. Battle Royale, Classic Mode and Competitive Mode. Battle Royale is, as the name implies, a traditional battle royale game in which the player is put into a 60 player server. On June 5th, 2020, a duos mode was released for testing where players could partner up with each other. Classic Mode consists of multiple game modes such as Team Deathmatch, Missile Launch, Capture Points, Vehicle Escort, and Bomb Disposal. Classic Mode servers have a capacity for 16 players per server. Competitive Mode is a 2 vs 2 game, with a server capacity of 4 players. Screenshot from War Brokers == Reception == War Brokers was rated 6th best online FPS shooter by MakeUseOf.com, saying the Battle Royale mode shares elements similar to PUBG, Fortnite and H1Z1. Gamespot's user ratings gave the game a rating of 8.4/10. == References == __FORCETOC__ Category:Unity (game engine) games Category:Browser-based game websites
title: War Brokers
